name: Anime Spot the Difference
description:
You will be shown two pictures side by side. The pictures may look similar at a glance, but if you look closely, you will find that there are 5 differences between the two. Try to find all of the differences without resorting to using hints.

Compare two images and spot five differences between them. Improve attention skills and exercise brain while playing this completely FREE arcade game.

Standard, Timed and Longplay games with specific or random images.

High quality images, works equally great on phones and tablets!

Spot the difference!

*Easy to play

*HD graphics

*Achievements

*Leaderboards

Animes in the game:

*Elfen Lied

*Dragon Ball

*Dragon Ball Z

*Dragon Ball GT

*Yu yu hakusho

*Yu-Gi-Oh

*Inuyasha

*Pokemon

*Detective Conan

*Full Metal Panic
